landing.title: Welcome to LanShout
landing.subtitle: A simple, real-time shoutbox designed for LAN parties and events. Let everyone share messages, coordinate games, and stay connected during your event.

simpleMessaging.title: Simple Messaging
simpleMessaging.description: Post quick messages and updates that everyone at your LAN can see instantly.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-Time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Messages appear instantly for all users with real-time synchronization.

builtForEvents.title: Built for Events
builtForEvents.description: Perfect for LAN parties, gaming events, and community gatherings.

cta.description: Log in to start chatting or create an account to join the conversation.
